response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I understand its worth to you might be around $8,000. However, considering the investment we've made into research, development, and production, I am offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This opportunity not only presents a great value for you but also secures your competitive edge in the market. I look forward to discussing how this product can revolutionize your business processes. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information.", "product_price": 9500}
